job_description:
- Support the control, distribution, and archiving of QC-related documents, including drawings, ITPs, and inspection reports.
- Ensure that all documents used in operations are up-to-date and properly registered.
- Assist with data entry and documentation tracking within the QC system.
- Prepare files and documentation required for internal and external audits.
- Coordinate with QC Engineers and Inspectors regarding document requests or updates.
